pullRequest.title: CAM-12024: configure telemetry via Java and Rest API

afterCommit.message:
feat(engine/rest): expose telemetry configuration in Java/REST API

* add openapi documentation

Related to CAM-12024

nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -1343,4 +1343,7 @@ Batch setJobRetriesAsync (List<String> processInstanceIds,
    */
   SchemaLogQuery createSchemaLogQuery();
 
+  /** Enable/disable telemetry */

nodes.bodyText: Since we discussed to always insert the property into the database on engine startup, it would be more performant just to update the property and not go again through the exclusive lock logic. Also, no OptimisticLockingException is thrown with the exclusive lock approach, which is counterintuitive for the user.

* add openapi documentation
